about_the_game:
This is an engaging arcade game where players slice flying fruits. You can be played on PC using a mouse. Players move the cursor across the screen to cut fruits, mimicking a blade. Each fruit sliced earns points. The goal is to score points by cutting as many fruits as possible. Playing with a mouse offers smooth, responsive control, making the game just as fun and fast-paced . Perfect for improving reflexes and enjoying quick action.

Hentai Slash with a mouse offers a new experience, providing smooth control and fast movements. The game’s vibrant visuals and satisfying sound effects remain intact, creating an immersive experience that rewards skill and quick decision-making. Whether you're aiming for a high score or just having fun slicing fruit, this game offers an addictive, action-packed gameplay experience.

Feature list :

The game has a light style.

Relaxing audio track.

Fullview mode after completing game.

Get ready for exciting and engaging experiences. Don't worry about time or scores, just enjoy the fun moments and immerse yourself in the colorful world of game !

content_descriptors.notes: This is the casual game. Game have imagines of a sexual and nudity. All characters are fictional and older 18 years.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a thrilling arcade game where players slice flying fruits using a mouse on a PC. The cursor acts as a virtual blade, and each fruit cut adds points. The goal is to slice as many fruits as possible. Smooth mouse controls make the game fast-paced and enjoyable for quick reflex training.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
